channel.title: Several disconnects followed by a weird night log
channel.description:
Account Arinyah. about 10.35 pm CET N3: You will matchmake 12 Poggers [7] and Walmart Basement[12] are a match! (entered it in log) *several disconnects* You cannot Matchmake a player with themselves. Your soul was reaped last night.
I was also able to write the night result in the log and it was visible for the others when I appeared dead.
I had several disconnects when entering the loading screen of some games in the afternoon as well

item.title: Several disconnects followed by a weird night log
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Did you grab a log from the game after the incident?

Read full topic
item.source: Several disconnects followed by a weird night log
